input-field.name: allowBuyInListing
input-field.label: Display buy buttons in listings
在列表中显示购买按钮
input-field.helpText: In product listings, buy buttons are displayed beneath every product. Deactivate to display detail buttons only.
在产品列表中，购买按钮显示在每个产品下方。禁用此选项将仅显示详情按钮。

input-field.name: autoplayVideoInListing
input-field.label: Autoplay videos in product listings
在产品列表中自动播放视频
input-field.helpText: Videos in product listings that are configured as product media covers are played automatically. Deactivate to display the first frame of video only.
在产品列表中，设置为产品媒体封面的 视频会自动播放。禁用此选项将只显示视频的第一帧。

input-field.name: hideCloseoutProductsWhenOutOfStock
input-field.label: Hide products after clearance
清仓后隐藏产品
input-field.helpText: Products marked as on "clearance sale" are hidden, as soon as their stock depletes back to 0.
标记为“清仓销售”的产品将在库存减少至 0 后被隐藏。

input-field.name: showReview
input-field.label: Show reviews
是否显示评价
input-field.helpText: 启用将在产品详情显示评价

input-field.name: reviewsPerPage
input-field.label: Number of reviews per page
每页显示的评论数量
input-field.helpText: The number of reviews displayed on a product page in the storefront.
在前端商品页面上显示的评论数量。

input-field.name: disableEmptyFilterOptions
input-field.label: Disable filter options without results
禁用没有结果的筛选选项
input-field.helpText: Filter options are deactivated and cannot be clicked if they provide no results
如果筛选选项没有结果，则该选项被禁用，无法点击

input-field.name: markAsNew
input-field.label: Mark products as 'new', for ? days
将产品标记为“新品”，持续 ? 天
input-field.helpText: Products are marked as new, if their release date does not date back past the set number of days.
如果产品的发布日期距今未超过设定的天数，则该产品会被标记为“新品”。

input-field.name: productsPerPage
input-field.label: Number of products per page
每页显示的产品数量
input-field.helpText: The number of products displayed on a search page or in a product list per page in the storefront.
在商城前端的搜索页面或产品列表中，每页显示的产品数量。
